DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this trial is to investigate effect of faldaprevir on steady state pharmacokinetics of raltegravir. The assessment of safety and tolerability will be an additional objective of this trial.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Faldaprevir Effect on Pharmacokinetics of Raltegravir
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
